divs: Sighting DetailsWas on my patio and was drawn to get up and look into the sky....wierd.I have always believed in ufo's.My reaction was calm and I knew exactly what they were.Acually I asked them to take me.You have to understand I have had a very bad two years....and this seemed to be a good idea at the time.I just want to know if anyone else saw these orbs in the area or near by.I just want to know I'm not losing my mind!!!!
Summary: Was looking out the backyard one spere showed up and seconds later a second one appeared.Stayed still for several minutes then they both left the same direction they came from a couple seconds apart.They glowed and looked like tiny moons.Amazing!!!
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around September 1st 2012
